* <b><i>/client</i></b>
**:<b><i>package.json</i></b>
 Defines top-level node project - including dependencies, yarn targets.;
**:<b><i>webpack.config.js</i></b>
 Webpack bundling configuration.;
**:<b><i>prettier.config.js</i></b>
 Code format configuration.;
**:<b><i>karma/</i></b>
 Configurations for running unit tests (mocha, qunit, etc.);
** <b><i>galaxy/</i></b>
***:<b><i>docs/</i></b>
 Vue Styleguidist entrypoint.;
***:<b><i>images/</i></b>
 Image assets that ship with Galaxy.;
***:<b><i>style/scss</i></b>
